results.title: To my dearest son Mileak
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Natasha Craig and ACMI
results.brief_description: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn’t regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Natasha Craig and ACMI
results.description: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn’t regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.
description_for_label: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn’t regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.

results.title: Always thinking of home
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Troy Lovett and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Troy Lovett and ACMI
results.description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.

results.title: Life story
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Joel Atkinson and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Joel Atkinson’s parents split up, his dad took him to Shepparton. Determined to make the most of it, Atkinson worked hard to be a good role model for his siblings.

results.title: Cousins
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Helen Atkinson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.
